mapper.insert: insert into Dealer (DealerID, DealerNo, DealerCode, DealerOwnerID, DealerNameCn, DealerNameEn, DealerShortNameCn, DealerShortNameEn, FormatID, FormatCodeID, Format, POCCDate, OpeningDate, SRBusinessHoursWorkday, SCBusinessHoursWorkday, SRBusinessHoursSat, SCBusinessHoursSat, SRBusinessHoursSun, SCBusinessHoursSun, StreetMapPath, OutletInteriorPhotoPath, OutletExteriorPhotoPath, ProvinceID, CityID, ZipCode, OperatingAddressCn, OperatingAddressEn, FaxCountryNo, FaxAreaNo, FaxNo, PhoneCountryNo, PhoneAreaNo, PhoneNo, SupportPhoneCountryNo, SupportPhoneAreaNo, SupportPhoneNo, Email, HomePage, InputDate, Status, Version, DealerGroupID, LeadingGSSN) values ( #{DealerID}, #{DealerNo}, #{DealerCode}, #{DealerOwnerID}, #{DealerNameCn}, #{DealerNameEn}, #{DealerShortNameCn}, #{DealerShortNameEn}, #{FormatID}, #{FormatCodeID}, #{Format}, #{POCCDate}, #{OpeningDate}, #{SRBusinessHoursWorkday}, #{SCBusinessHoursWorkday}, #{SRBusinessHoursSat}, #{SCBusinessHoursSat}, #{SRBusinessHoursSun}, #{SCBusinessHoursSun}, #{StreetMapPath}, #{OutletInteriorPhotoPath}, #{OutletExteriorPhotoPath}, #{ProvinceID}, #{CityID}, #{ZipCode}, #{OperatingAddressCn}, #{OperatingAddressEn}, #{FaxCountryNo}, #{FaxAreaNo}, #{FaxNo}, #{PhoneCountryNo}, #{PhoneAreaNo}, #{PhoneNo}, #{SupportPhoneCountryNo}, #{SupportPhoneAreaNo}, #{SupportPhoneNo}, #{Email}, #{HomePage}, #{InputDate}, #{Status}, #{Version}, #{DealerGroupID}, #{LeadingGSSN})
